headline: Comcast makes cable TV plans more generous after customer losses
summary: Comcast, which offers cable TV, phone, and internet services under its Xfinity brand, is doubling down on luring back cable TV customers who have increasingly cut the cord on service after the company enforced harsh changes that raised monthly bills. During the third quarter of this year, Comcast ...
